doc.name: wscreate
doc.synopsis: Defines the target page and template for new pages
doc.description: Cf wsedit, which is used to edit existing pages
doc.parameters:
mwtemplate = Name of the template

mwwrite = Either the full name of the target page, or its prefix if used in combination with mwoption="add_random" 

mwoption = "add_random" for random numbers
doc.example:
Used with a variable
<wscreate mwwrite="{{#var:@targetpagetitle}}" mwtemplate="Agency"/>

Prefix + random number
<wscreate mwwrite="Proj-solution:" mwoption="add_random" mwtemplate="Solution"/>
